items.sentence: I\'ve always wanted to learn to play the drums.
I\'ve been trying to reach Tom since yesterday.
I\'ve been waiting for this moment all my life.
Tom got a toy hammer and toolbox for Christmas.
Tom got into the car and slammed the door shut.
Tom grabbed his guitar and headed for the door.
Tom has been in the bathroom for quite a while.
Tom seems to be expecting Mary to do something.
Tom set the table for dinner while Mary cooked.
Tom shared a room with his younger sister Mary.
Tom should be able to complete the job quickly.
Tom showed Mary how to use the washing machine.
In other words, I don\'t like to work with him.
Tom and Mary sat at opposite ends of the couch.
Tom and Mary seem to be more than just friends.
Tom and Mary spend a lot of money on their son.
Tom and Mary spent all morning baking cupcakes.
Tom doesn\'t have as much energy as he used to.
Tom doesn\'t know anything about the situation.
Tom doesn\'t understand why Mary is so popular.
